title: How do I get a S rank as support?
body: Just wondering, what do I actually need to do as support to get S ranks?

replies.body: Mastery scores aren't based off set requirements. You need to have your overall gameplay in the top percentage of people using that specific champion as a support champ. For instance, playing Sona Support and Bard support would be scored slightly differently. Improve your overall gameplay including stuff like assists, gold gained, and vision score to up your Mastery scores.
